jobTitle: Program Coordinator (Bilingual in Spanish or Chinese)
jobDescription: The Program Coordinator is responsible for processing client referrals, care provider information packets, and client authorizations. The Program Coordinator facilitates service provision for a client/ family from the initial referral to the point where the client and their care provider are submitting time cards for payment. This role is also responsible for entering time cards every pay cycle. A Program Coordinator is a primary point of contact for Premier clients and helps to grow and maintain relationships with our clients, care providers and referral sources. WHAT PREMIER OFFERS: WEEKLY pay (competitive rate).  BENEFITS: Medical, Dental, Vision, vacations/sick days, life insurance, and 401(k).  Make a difference in a child/adult's life.  FUN, POSITIVE, and PROFESSIONAL work environment.  Employee appreciation events & employee recognition awards.  Weekly core values meeting, regular paid trainings & orientations.  Monthly and quarterly office outings, and an annual company-wide beach party.
